channel.title: q-bio.CB updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: q-bio.CB updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: A General Model of Structured Cell Kinetics
item.description: arXiv:2102.06490v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We present a modelling framework for the dynamics of cells structured by the concentration of a micromolecule they contain. We derive general equations for the evolution of the cell population and of the extra-cellular concentration of the molecule and apply this approach to models of silicosis, quorum sensing in Gram-negative bacteria and magnetic ion exchange.
item.dc:creator: Michael Grinfeld, Nigel Mottram, Jozsef Farkas

item.title: Life at low Reynolds number isn't such a drag
item.description: arXiv:2410.20648v2 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: The following is an unedited version of two short articles that are forthcoming in Nature Chemical Engineering. Inspired by Purcell's classic lecture "Life at low Reynolds number", I discuss how scaling arguments, dimensional analysis, and fundamental concepts from chemical engineering science can be used to quantitatively describe microbial swimming -- thereby helping to better understand biological systems and inspiring new engineering advances in turn.
item.dc:creator: Sujit S. Datta
